property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Gimli is declared as a defender, spend 1 resource from Gimli’s resource pool to ready another hero. If that hero is Legolas, he gets +1 Û until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Legolas commits to a quest, discard a card from your hand to ready another hero. If that hero is Gimli, he gets +1 Ò until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Greenwood Archer enters play, ready a hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: When you play Erebor Guard from your hand, discard the top 2 cards of your deck to reduce its cost by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there is a side quest in the victory display, Halfling Bounder gains: “Response: Discard Halfling Bounder to cancel the ‘when revealed’ effects of an encounter card that was just revealed from the encounter deck.”

property.name: Text
property.value: While there is a side quest in the victory display, Vigilant Dunadan does not exhaust to defend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a unique character with the Silvan trait and another unique character with the Dwarf trait.Action: Draw 1 card and add 1 resource to the resource pool of a hero you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a unique character with the Noble trait and another unique character with the Scout trait.Response: After a player engages an enemy, he reduces his threat by X, where X is the just engaged enemy’s printed $.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Deal X damage to an enemy engaged with you. X is the number of side quests in the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Dwarf hero. Restricted.Attached hero gets +1 Ú.Response: After attached hero takes any amount of damage from an enemy attack, exhaust Dwarven Shield to add 1 resource to attached hero’s pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Silvan hero. Restricted.Attached hero gets +1 Ò and +1 Û.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a quest card in play. Response: When attached quest is defeated, the first player chooses a player. That players searches his deck for a side quest, adds it to his hand, and shuffles his deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 copy of The Storm Comes in the victory display. While this quest is in the victory display, the first ally played by each player each round does not require a resource match.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After an enemy attacks and destroys a character, remove X progress from the main quest. X is the attacking enemy’s $.At the end of the the round, if the main quest has been in play the entire round and there are no progress tokens on it, the players lose the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After the player travel here, choose a non-unique enemy engaged with a player and place it faceup under this location. While an enemy is under this location, that enemy is considered to be out of play.Forced: After Narrow Alleyway leaves play, put each enemy under it into play, engaged with the first player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Umbar Sentry attacks, either remove 1 progress token from the main quest, or it gets +2 Û for this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Street of Umbar is the active location, each enemy gets -1 engagement cost for each progress token on the main quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Umbar Square is the active location, it gains: “Response: After an enemy is defeated, place 1 progress on the main quest, bypassing the active location.” Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck to travel here.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the number of engaged enemies.Travel: Assign X damage among characters in play to travel here.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Haradrim Estate is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed here.Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Harad enemy and put it into play engaged with the first player. Then, place 1 progress on the main quest, bypassing the active location. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either remove all progress from the main quest, or assign X damage among characters in play. X is the number of progress tokens on the main quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the end of the round, remove X progress from the main quest. X is the tens digit of the temperature. Response: When Seek Shade is defeated, reduce the temperature by 10.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the tens digit of the temperature.Forced: After Were-worm engages you, it makes an immediate attack. (Do not deal it a shadow card.)

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the temperature is 40 or higher).

property.name: Text
property.value: Carrion Bird gets -1 engagement cost for each damaged character in play.Forced: After Carrion Bird engages you, discard a damaged character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: While the temperature is 40 or higher, Burnt Sands gets +2 $.Forced: After Burnt Sands becomes the active location, increase the temperature by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the tens digit of the temperature.Forced: After Scorched Hamada becomes the active location, assign X damage among characters in play.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Raise your threat by X, where X is the tens digit of the temperature.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Parched Wadi is in the staging area, each Creature enemy gets +1 $ and +1 Û.Forced: After Parched Wadi becomes the active location, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until a Creature enemy is discarded. Add that enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard a the active location. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until a location is discarded. Make that location the active location.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player assigns X damage among characters he controls, where X is the tens digit of the temperature.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û, where X is the tens digit of the temperature.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Increase the temperature by 4.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Either raise the temperature by 2, or return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: At the beginning of the planning phase, add 1 resource to a hero’s resource pool. If Kahliel leaves play, you are eliminated from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Firyal commits to a quest, look at the top card of the encounter deck. Then, you may discard that card. If Firyal leaves play, you are eliminated from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Yazan is declared as an attacker, deal 1 damage to a non-unique enemy in play. (Limit once per phase.) If Yazan leaves play, you are eliminated from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Jubayr is declared as a defender, discard 1 facedown shadow card from a non-unique enemy. (Limit once per phase.) If Jubayr leaves play, you are eliminated from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the sequence number on the main quest.Forced: At the end of the round, assign X damage among characters in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the stage number of the main quest.Travel: Each player spends 1 resource to travel here.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If the defending character is an objective-hero, ready it and cancel all damage from this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After the players travel to Village Hut, the first player discards the top card of his deck. If that card is an ally, he puts it into play under his control, exhausted.Travel: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is an enemy, add it to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either discard the highest cost ally you control, or reveal an encounter card.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, increase the total $ in the staging area by X, where X is twice the stage number of the main quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Assign X damage among characters you control, where X is the stage number of the main quest.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a Harad enemy is discarded. Add that enemy to the staging area and place a resource token on it. That enemy is “the Champion.” While this stage is in play, the Champion gets +2 $, +2 Û, +2 Ú and gains: “Immune to player card effects. The main quest stage cannot be defeated while the Champion is in play.” The champion cannot take damage unless there are at least 4 progress tokens here. This stage cannot be defeated while the champion is in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Southron Captain is in the staging area, each other Harad enemy gets +1 $.While Southron Captain is engaged with you, each other Harad enemy engaged with you gets +1 Û.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Southron Soldier engages you, either remove 2 progress tokens from the main quest, or Southron Soldier makes an immediate attack.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Engage it and deal it a shadow card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Southron Archer engages you, either remove 2 progress tokens from the main quest, or discard an ally you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded, and puts that enemy into play engaged with him.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if it was engaged this round).

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player cannot have more than 5 cards in his hand. (If you have more than 5, immediately choose and discard cards from hand until you have only 5.) Response: When this stage is defeated, each player draws a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either raise your threat by 1 for each character you control, or discard a character you control.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, raise each player’s threat by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player exhausts a character he controls. Until the end of the combat phase, exhausted characters cannot ready.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Until the end of the round, defending character cannot ready.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters cannot be readied by player card effects. Response: When this stage is defeated, each player readies 1 hero he controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Towering Dunes is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area not named Towering Dunes.Forced: After Towering Dunes becomes the active location, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Desert Oasis is the active location, it gains: “Response: When Desert Oasis is explored, heal 4 damage from among characters in play.”Forced: After Desert Oasis becomes the active location, each player exhausts a character he controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player either discards his hand, or assigns X damage among characters he controls. X is the number of cards in his hand.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Either discard the highest cost attachment you control, or assign X damage among characters you control where X is the number of attachments you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player exhausts a character he controls and deals 1 damage to that character.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat the printed text box of each damaged character as if it were blank (except for Traits). Response: When this is defeated, heal 1 damage from each character in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players cannot declare defenders against Sand Viper.Forced: After the players travel to a location, Sand Viper engages the first player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Giant Scorpion damages a character, that character cannot ready until the end of the round.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack deals damage, the defending character cannot ready until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Jungle Trail is the active location, each location in the staging area gets -1 $.Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck to travel here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Forest Clearing is explored, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is an enemy, add that enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Dense Jungle is explored, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is a location, add that location to the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard a random card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to the highest $ location in the staging area without a copy of Overgrown attached. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached location gets +1 $ and gains ‘Immune to player card effects.’”)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Orc enemy in the staging area gets -5 engagement cost. Each Orc enemy engaged with a player gets +1 $.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have player card attachments or be optionally engaged.While the engaged player is engaged with another Orc enemy, Uruk Chieftain cannot take damage.Forced: At the end of the encounter phase, Uruk Chieftain engages the player engaged with the most non-unique Orc enemies.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each ally with less Ò than Uruk of Mordor’s $ cannot defend against Uruk of Mordor.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if its $ is greater than the defending character’s Ò).

property.name: Text
property.value: Uruk Warg-Rider gets +X Û while attacking a character with less Ò than Uruk Warg-rider’s $. X is the difference.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to an Orc enemy and return that enemy to the staging area. Limit 1 per enemy. (Counts as a Mount attachment with the text: “Attached enemy gets +2 $, +2 Û, +2 Ú and +2 hit points. Forced: When attached enemy leaves play, add Mordor Warg to the staging area.”)

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each ally in play gets -1 Ò, -1 Û, and -1 Ú until the end of the round.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If attacking enemy’s $ is greater than the defending character’s Ò, it makes an additional attack after this one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Add “Seize them!” to the staging area. Each player adds 1 different location to the staging area and puts 1 copy of Umbar Sentry into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Alarm bells ring from high watchtowers and the city guard shouts for you to lay down your arms and surrender. You must run or be captured!This stage cannot have more than 15 progress tokens on it.While at least 1 player is engaged with an enemy, the players cannot defeat this stage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: End the current phase. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Starting with the first player, each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until he discards an enemy, and puts that enemy into play engaged with him.

property.name: Text
property.value: This stage cannot have more than 15 progress tokens on it.Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, if any player is not engaged with an enemy, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded and add it to the staging area.While at least 1 player is engaged with an enemy, the players cannot defeat this stage. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Each player searches the encounter deck for a copy of Burnt Sands and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Place the heat tracker next to the quest deck and set the temperature to 10.

property.name: Text
property.value: As the sun climbs into the sky, you can feel the rising heat begin to take its toll on you...Forced: After an ally enters play, either exhaust it, or deal 1 damage to it.Forced: At the end of the round, increase the temperature by 4. If the temperature is 60 or higher, the players lose the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Increase the temperature by 2. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and reveal 1 encounter card per player.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you cannot make it across the desert soon, you are certain to die of thrist...Forced: At the end of the round, increase the temperature by 4. Then, each player assigns X damage among characters he controls, where X is the tens digit of the temperature.If the temperature is 60 or higher, the players lose the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Increase the temperature by 2. Each player searches the encounter deck, discard pile, and victory display for a Were-worm and adds it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the quest phase, add X $ to the total $ in the staging area, where X is the tens digit of the temperature.Forced: At the end of the round, increase the temperature by 4. While at least 1 Were-worm is in play, the players cannot defeat this stage. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game. If the temperature is 60 or higher, the players lose the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set Uruk Chieftain aside, out of play. Each player adds 1 copy of Sauron’s Enforcers to the staging area. Move each hero to the staging area. Each player takes control of an objective-hero and adds 2 resources to its resource pool. Remove each remaining objective-hero from the game. For the remainder of the game, heroes in the staging area are in play but under no player’s control, immune to player card effects, and their text boxes are considered to be blank.

property.name: Text
property.value: Damage from undefended attacks must be dealt to a hero in the staging area, if able.The first card each player plays each phase does not require a resource match.Forced: After placing progress from questing successfully, each player chooses a hero he owns in the staging area and, takes control of that hero, and exhausts it. Advance to stage 2A.

property.name: Text
property.value: Damage from undefended attacks must be dealt to a hero in the staging area, if able.The first card each player plays each phase does not require a resource match. Forced: When this stage is defeated, each player chooses a hero he owns in the staging area, takes control of that hero, and exhausts it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an Orc enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Attach each hero in the staging area to a different Orc enemy in the staging area. Each hero attached to an enemy is guarded by that enemy. Guarded heroes are under no player’s control, immune to player card effects, and their text boxes are considered to be blank.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an enemy is guarding a hero it gets +1 $, +1 Û, +1 Ú and is immune to player card effects.Forced: When the enemy guarding a hero is defeated, that hero’s owner takes control of that hero and exhausts it.This stage cannot be defeated while an enemy is guarding a hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Uruk Chieftain to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and reveal 1 encounter card per player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uruk Chieftain cannot take non-combat damage.Each non-unique Orc enemy gets -10 engagement cost.Forced: After Uruk Chieftain engages a player, it makes an immediate attack.The players cannot defeat this stage while Uruk Chieftain is in play. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.
